page.title: 13THE SPORTS CENTRE BLYTH
page.content: We telephoned the manager at the Sport's Centre and asked him a few questions about the Sport's Centre. We asked him when it was built and he said 1967. We asked him why they had to modernise it and he told us it was in a very bad state of repair. We asked him how many staff worked for him and he said about 70. He told us that the Centre was 18years old now, and that the most popular sport there was swimming. There are 20 to 25 other different sports organised, and people travel from all around the area to take part in these. Some of the other sports are badminton, squash, judo, gymnastics, five a side football and keep fit.
